arrestInstruction: And a new investigation will begin.

gameOver.riptext: You've mistakenly released a criminal, while innocent suspects have been unjustly persecuted. Next time, try to delve deeper into the mindset of the AI during its interrogation.

help.title: Welcome, Human Investigator!
help.text1: Your mission is to identify the criminal hiding among a group of suspects. The only witness to the crime is an artificial intelligence, so you'll need to rely on its answers to solve the case.
help.text2: Each turn, a random question from a forensic questionnaire will be selected for you. Wait for the AI witness to answer the question about the criminal's characteristics. Your job is to eliminate one or more suspects who do not match the AI's answer.
help.text3: After eliminating suspects, proceed to the next question to gather more clues and continue narrowing down the suspects. Keep freeing the innocent until only one remains – the criminal!
help.text4: If you successfully catch the criminal, you’ll move on to the next case. But be careful: if you eliminate guilty suspect, the game will be over. Tune into the AI’s responses carefully and trust your instincts to crack the case! After all, it's trained to do what we humans do...
